segments.text: Hello . In order to kill your time you can experience our facial massage for free .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This way please . First , we should clean your face with our clarifying cream . And then we use the massage cream . Next do the massage . I hope that you can feel comfortable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very comfortable . I think I will come next time . Maybe I will take some friends . Amazing !
segments.speaker: S2
